CustomField.description: Determines whether a customer is currently advertising or at risk/lapsed/long lapsed depending on date of last advertising
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(UPPER(Customer_Segment__c) = UPPER('Key'),UPPER(Customer_Segment__c) = UPPER('Con'),UPPER(Customer_Segment__c) = UPPER('IMA')), (IF(BLANKVALUE(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-91 || BLANKVALUE(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-91 || BLANKVALUE(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-91,'Trading Client', (IF(BLANKVALUE(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-182 || BLANKVALUE(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-182 || BLANKVALUE(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-182,'At Risk Client', (IF(BLANKVALUE(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-365 || BLANKVALUE(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-365 || BLANKVALUE(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-365,'Lapsed Client', 'Long Lapsed Client')))))),
IF( UPPER(Customer_Segment__c) = UPPER('SME'), (IF(BLANKVALUE(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-28 || BLANKVALUE(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-28 || BLANKVALUE(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-28,'Trading Client', (IF(BLANKVALUE(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-42 || BLANKVALUE(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-42 || BLANKVALUE(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-42,'At Risk Client', (IF(BLANKVALUE(Digital_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-91 || BLANKVALUE(Print_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-91 || BLANKVALUE(Xtend_Last_Transaction_Date__c, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= TODAY()-91,'Lapsed Client', 'Long Lapsed Client')))))),'Not In SME, Key, Con or IMA Segment') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines whether a customer is currently advertising or at risk/lapsed/long lapsed depending on date of last advertising
CustomField.label: Client Trading Activity
